                  <div class="tb-megamenu-column-inner mega-inner clearfix">
                   <ul class="tb-megamenu-subnav mega-nav level-1 items-2">
                    <li class="tb-megamenu-item level-2 mega mega-group" data-alignsub="" data-caption="" data-class="" data-group="1" data-hidesub="0" data-hidewcol="0" data-id="192644" data-level="2" data-type="menu_item" data-xicon="">
                     <a class="mega-group-title" href="/de/gastronomie/arrangements">
                      Arrangements
                     </a>
                     <div class="tb-megamenu-submenu mega-group-ct nav-child" data-class="" data-width="">
                      <div class="mega-dropdown-inner">
                       <div class="tb-megamenu-row row-fluid">
                        <div class="tb-megamenu-column span12 mega-col-nav" data-class="" data-hidewcol="" data-showblocktitle="1" data-width="12" id="tb-megamenu-column-28">
                         <div class="tb-megamenu-column-inner mega-inner clearfix">
                          <div class="tb-megamenu-block tb-block tb-megamenu-block" data-block="bean--mainmenu---grafik---gastro--arra" data-type="block">
                           <div class="block-inner">
                            <div class="block block-bean odd" id="block-bean-mainmenu-grafik-gastro-arra">
                             <div class="entity entity-bean bean-admin view-mode-default ">

                           </li>
                           <li class="tb-megamenu-item level-3 mega" data-alignsub="" data-caption="" data-class="" data-group="0" data-hidesub="0" data-hidewcol="0" data-id="192995" data-level="3" data-type="menu_item" data-xicon="">
                            <a href="http://corporate.europapark.com/de/unternehmen/sozialesengagement">
                             Soziales Engagement
                            </a>
                           </li>
                           <li class="tb-megamenu-item level-3 mega" data-alignsub="" data-caption="" data-class="" data-group="0" data-hidesub="0" data-hidewcol="0" data-id="192997" data-level="3" data-type="menu_item" data-xicon="">
                            <a href="/de/infos/dienste/informationsmaterialien">
                             Informationsmaterialien
                            </a>
                           </li>
                          </ul>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </li>
                   </ul>
                  </div>
                 </div>

                   <ul class="tb-megamenu-subnav mega-nav level-1 items-1">

          <div class="grid-element grid-mobile-c1r12 grid-tablet-c1r12 grid-desktop-c1r12 grid-linebreak">
           <div class="panel-pane pane-node-content">
            <div class="node node-page node-full node-page-full view-mode-full ">
             <h2>
              Bilder aus dem Europa-Park
             </h2>
             <p>
              Wie kann ein einmaliger Augenblick im Europa-Park besser festgehalten werden, als mit einem Schnappschuss. Postet eure schönsten Fotos und Videos mit #europapark auf Instagram, Twitter und Facebook und teilt eure Eindrücke hier!
             </p>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="grid-element grid-mobile-c1r12 grid-tablet-c1r12 grid-desktop-c1r12 grid-linebreak">

            </div>

           <div class="nav-collapse always-show">
            <ul class="tb-megamenu-nav nav level-0 items-8">
             <li class="tb-megamenu-item level-1 mega mega-align-justify dropdown" data-alignsub="justify" data-caption="" data-class="" data-group="0" data-hidesub="0" data-hidewcol="0" data-id="192619" data-level="1" data-type="menu_item" data-xicon="">
              <a class="dropdown-toggle" href="/de/alle-attraktionen" title="Attraktionen">
               Attraktionen

                     </div>
                    </li>
                   </ul>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <div class="tb-megamenu-column span4 mega-col-nav" data-class="" data-hidewcol="" data-width="4" id="tb-megamenu-column-45">
                  <div class="tb-megamenu-column-inner mega-inner clearfix">
                   <ul class="tb-megamenu-subnav mega-nav level-1 items-1">
                    <li class="tb-megamenu-item level-2 mega mega-group" data-alignsub="" data-caption="" data-class="" data-group="1" data-hidesub="0" data-hidewcol="0" data-id="192868" data-level="2" data-type="menu_item" data-xicon="">
                     <a class="mega-group-title" href="/de/infos/digitale-angebote">
                      Digitale Angebote
                     </a>
                     <div class="tb-megamenu-submenu mega-group-ct nav-child" data-class="" data-width="">
                      <div class="mega-dropdown-inner">
                       <div class="tb-megamenu-row row-fluid">
                        <div class="tb-megamenu-column span12 mega-col-nav" data-class="" data-hidewcol="0" data-width="12" id="tb-megamenu-column-43">
                         <div class="tb-megamenu-column-inner mega-inner clearfix">
                          <ul class="tb-megamenu-subnav mega-nav level-2 items-6">
                           <li class="tb-megamenu-item level-3 mega" data-alignsub="" data-caption="" data-class="" data-group="0" data-hidesub="0" data-hidewcol="0" data-id="193022" data-level="3" data-type="menu_item" data-xicon="">

           <div class="panel-pane pane-node-content">
            <div class="node node-page node-full node-page-full view-mode-full ">
             <h2>
              Bilder aus dem Europa-Park
             </h2>
             <p>
              Wie kann ein einmaliger Augenblick im Europa-Park besser festgehalten werden, als mit einem Schnappschuss. Postet eure schönsten Fotos und Videos mit #europapark auf Instagram, Twitter und Facebook und teilt eure Eindrücke hier!
             </p>
            </div>
           </div>

          <div class="tb-megamenu tb-megamenu-main-menu">
           <button class="btn btn-navbar tb-megamenu-button" data-target=".nav-collapse" data-toggle="collapse" type="button">

           <div class="nav-collapse always-show">
            <ul class="tb-megamenu-nav nav level-0 items-8">
             <li class="tb-megamenu-item level-1 mega mega-align-justify dropdown" data-alignsub="justify" data-caption="" data-class="" data-group="0" data-hidesub="0" data-hidewcol="0" data-id="192619" data-level="1" data-type="menu_item" data-xicon="">
              <a class="dropdown-toggle" href="/de/alle-attraktionen" title="Attraktionen">
               Attraktionen
              </a>
              <div class="tb-megamenu-submenu dropdown-menu mega-dropdown-menu nav-child" data-class="" data-width="">
               <div class="mega-dropdown-inner">
                <div class="tb-megamenu-row row-fluid">
                 <div class="tb-megamenu-column span3 mega-col-nav" data-class="" data-hidewcol="0" data-width="3" id="tb-megamenu-column-2">
                  <div class="tb-megamenu-column-inner mega-inner clearfix">

                 <div class="tb-megamenu-column span4 mega-col-nav" data-class="" data-hidewcol="" data-width="4" id="tb-megamenu-column-45">
                  <div class="tb-megamenu-column-inner mega-inner clearfix">
                   <ul class="tb-megamenu-subnav mega-nav level-1 items-1">
                    <li class="tb-megamenu-item level-2 mega mega-group" data-alignsub="" data-caption="" data-class="" data-group="1" data-hidesub="0" data-hidewcol="0" data-id="192868" data-level="2" data-type="menu_item" data-xicon="">

                      Digitale Angebote

                      <div class="mega-dropdown-inner">
                       <div class="tb-megamenu-row row-fluid">
                        <div class="tb-megamenu-column span12 mega-col-nav" data-class="" data-hidewcol="0" data-width="12" id="tb-megamenu-column-43">
                         <div class="tb-megamenu-column-inner mega-inner clearfix">
                          <ul class="tb-megamenu-subnav mega-nav level-2 items-6">

           <div class="panel-pane pane-node-content">
            <div class="node node-page node-full node-page-full view-mode-full ">
             <h2>
              Bilder aus dem Europa-Park
             </h2>
             <p>
              Wie kann ein einmaliger Augenblick im Europa-Park besser festgehalten werden, als mit einem Schnappschuss. Postet eure schönsten Fotos und Videos mit #europapark auf Instagram, Twitter und Facebook und teilt eure Eindrücke hier!
             </p>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>

          <div class="tb-megamenu tb-megamenu-main-menu">
           <button class="btn btn-navbar tb-megamenu-button" data-target=".nav-collapse" data-toggle="collapse" type="button">

           <div class="nav-collapse always-show">
            <ul class="tb-megamenu-nav nav level-0 items-8">
             <li class="tb-megamenu-item level-1 mega mega-align-justify dropdown" data-alignsub="justify" data-caption="" data-class="" data-group="0" data-hidesub="0" data-hidewcol="0" data-id="192619" data-level="1" data-type="menu_item" data-xicon="">
              <a class="dropdown-toggle" href="/de/alle-attraktionen" title="Attraktionen">
               Attraktionen
              </a>
              <div class="tb-megamenu-submenu dropdown-menu mega-dropdown-menu nav-child" data-class="" data-width="">
               <div class="mega-dropdown-inner">
                <div class="tb-megamenu-row row-fluid">
                 <div class="tb-megamenu-column span3 mega-col-nav" data-class="" data-hidewcol="0" data-width="3" id="tb-megamenu-column-2">
                  <div class="tb-megamenu-column-inner mega-inner clearfix">

                 <div class="tb-megamenu-column span4 mega-col-nav" data-class="" data-hidewcol="" data-width="4" id="tb-megamenu-column-45">
                  <div class="tb-megamenu-column-inner mega-inner clearfix">
                   <ul class="tb-megamenu-subnav mega-nav level-1 items-1">
                    <li class="tb-megamenu-item level-2 mega mega-group" data-alignsub="" data-caption="" data-class="" data-group="1" data-hidesub="0" data-hidewcol="0" data-id="192868" data-level="2" data-type="menu_item" data-xicon="">

                      Digitale Angebote

                      <div class="mega-dropdown-inner">
                       <div class="tb-megamenu-row row-fluid">
                        <div class="tb-megamenu-column span12 mega-col-nav" data-class="" data-hidewcol="0" data-width="12" id="tb-megamenu-column-43">
                         <div class="tb-megamenu-column-inner mega-inner clearfix">
                          <ul class="tb-megamenu-subnav mega-nav level-2 items-6">

           <div class="panel-pane pane-node-content">
            <div class="node node-page node-full node-page-full view-mode-full ">
             <h2>
              Bilder aus dem Europa-Park
             </h2>
             <p>
              Wie kann ein einmaliger Augenblick im Europa-Park besser festgehalten werden, als mit einem Schnappschuss. Postet eure schönsten Fotos und Videos mit #europapark auf Instagram, Twitter und Facebook und teilt eure Eindrücke hier!
             </p>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>

          <div class="tb-megamenu tb-megamenu-main-menu">
           <button class="btn btn-navbar tb-megamenu-button" data-target=".nav-collapse" data-toggle="collapse" type="button">

           <div class="nav-collapse always-show">
            <ul class="tb-megamenu-nav nav level-0 items-8">
             <li class="tb-megamenu-item level-1 mega mega-align-justify dropdown" data-alignsub="justify" data-caption="" data-class="" data-group="0" data-hidesub="0" data-hidewcol="0" data-id="192619" data-level="1" data-type="menu_item" data-xicon="">
              <a class="dropdown-toggle" href="/de/alle-attraktionen" title="Attraktionen">
               Attraktionen
              </a>
              <div class="tb-megamenu-submenu dropdown-menu mega-dropdown-menu nav-child" data-class="" data-width="">
               <div class="mega-dropdown-inner">
                <div class="tb-megamenu-row row-fluid">
                 <div class="tb-megamenu-column span3 mega-col-nav" data-class="" data-hidewcol="0" data-width="3" id="tb-megamenu-column-2">
                  <div class="tb-megamenu-column-inner mega-inner clearfix">

                 <div class="tb-megamenu-column span4 mega-col-nav" data-class="" data-hidewcol="" data-width="4" id="tb-megamenu-column-45">
                  <div class="tb-megamenu-column-inner mega-inner clearfix">
                   <ul class="tb-megamenu-subnav mega-nav level-1 items-1">
                    <li class="tb-megamenu-item level-2 mega mega-group" data-alignsub="" data-caption="" data-class="" data-group="1" data-hidesub="0" data-hidewcol="0" data-id="192868" data-level="2" data-type="menu_item" data-xicon="">

                      Digitale Angebote

                      <div class="mega-dropdown-inner">
                       <div class="tb-megamenu-row row-fluid">
                        <div class="tb-megamenu-column span12 mega-col-nav" data-class="" data-hidewcol="0" data-width="12" id="tb-megamenu-column-43">
                         <div class="tb-megamenu-column-inner mega-inner clearfix">
                          <ul class="tb-megamenu-subnav mega-nav level-2 items-6">

           <div class="panel-pane pane-node-content">
            <div class="node node-page node-full node-page-full view-mode-full ">
             <h2>
              Bilder aus dem Europa-Park
             </h2>
             <p>
              Wie kann ein einmaliger Augenblick im Europa-Park besser festgehalten werden, als mit einem Schnappschuss. Postet eure schönsten Fotos und Videos mit #europapark auf Instagram, Twitter und Facebook und teilt eure Eindrücke hier!
             </p>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
